title: Seven Years to Sin
description: Seven Years to Sin – a classic erotic romance – by Sylvia Day – author of the sensational international bestselling Bared to You, first book in the Crossfire series – is a smart, sensual story of a young woman’s sexual awakening at the hands of a handsome rogue in Regency England.Seven years ago, on the eve of her wedding, young Lady Jessica Sheffield witnessed a scandalous seduction by the roguish Alistair Caulfield. But after years of serene but unfulfilling marriage, she still cannot free her dreams of this illicit liaison. So when newly widowed Jessica steps aboard Caulfield’s ship for a transatlantic passage, years of denied pleasure and passion will be unleashed in the most provocative way . . .
author: Sylvia Day
